metadata.name: sun hearts
metadata.description:
These hearts will electrify your day! Say hello to Sun Hearts, a scrapped heart concept from Antibirth!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/dsDkKP7.png[/img]
[list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/iZnhTXp.png[/img] A soul heart variant that has a [b]50% chance[/b] of adding an extra pip of charge upon completing a room and is breakable in one hit [list] [*][u]How to collect:[/u][list] [*]Has a [b]20% chance[/b] to replace Eternal Hearts [img]https://i.imgur.com/v91sWU9.png[/img] [/list] [/list] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/FFDtngB.png[/img] [b]Sumptorium[/b] synergy [img]https://i.imgur.com/FFDtngB.png[/img][list] [*]Spawns a [b]Sun Clot[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/BMdlOzt.png[/img][list] [*]No HP Decay [*]Upon death, adds an [b]extra charge[/b] to your active item [img]https://i.imgur.com/QGopnd6.png[/img][/list] [/list] [/list] [/list] [b][h1]----------------------- ğŒğ¨ğ ğ‚ğ¨ğ¦ğ©ğšğ­ğ¢ğ›ğ¢ğ¥ğ¢ğ­ğ² ----------------------[/h1][/b][list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635]MiniMAPI[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Mod Config Menu[/url] (And Dead Sea Scrolls)[list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2616687713]UI Hearts[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2591936266]Lifebar[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2561215035]Alternative Hearts +[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2773637668]Flashy HUD + Pickups[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2777269929]Re-color UI[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2545179560]Beautiful Custom HUD[/url] [/list] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SK84PpX.png[/img]
